definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be hoary (NH [[שֵׂיבָה]] old age; As. šêbu, aged man; Ar. 4a0ba (y) become hoary, Eth. 3eba: (in deriv.); Aram. [[סִיב]] be old; se0b grow old, sayboto0 grey hair);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. I S. [[זׇקַנְתִּי וׇשַׂ֫בְתִּי]] 1Sa 12:2; Pt. [[שָׂב]] Job 15:10 (+ [[יׇשִׁישׁ]] aged).
